description:
Camille is Goh`s mother. Her husband is Walker. She lives on the 7th floor of an apartment complex in the Kanto region within a bus journey of the Cerise Laboratory. Her mother, Halta, lives with her.
Camille is a programmer and Walker is a systems engineer. They work on their own business called Go-Go Systems and whenever there`s a systems emergency, their expertise is in high demand. They often stay at the office late, so Goh can`t just show up at home out of the blue. He makes sure to call his parents ahead of time.
name: Kurune
